content.en: Two papers have been accepted to USENIX ATC'24. Congratulations to [Ronglong](/rong-long-wu), [Shuyue](/shu-yue-zhou), and [Yijie](/yi-jie-zhong).
content.zh: 两篇论文被 USENIX ATC'24 接收。祝贺 [吴镕龙](/rong-long-wu-zh)、[周书悦](/shu-yue-zhou-zh) 和 [钟一捷](/yi-jie-zhong-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to IEEE TC. Congratulations to [Ronglong](/rong-long-wu).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 IEEE TC 接收。祝贺 [吴镕龙](/rong-long-wu-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to HPCA'24. Congratulations to [Ronglong](/rong-long-wu).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 HPCA'24 接收。祝贺 [吴镕龙](/rong-long-wu-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to IEEE TC. Congratulations to Guowen.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 IEEE TC 接收。祝贺 龚国文。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ICDE'23. Congratulations to [Yijie](/yi-jie-zhong).
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ICDE'23 接收。祝贺 [钟一捷](/yi-jie-zhong-zh)。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ICCD'22. Congratulations to Hongbin.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ICCD'22 接收。祝贺 龚红彬。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ICCD'21. Congratulations to Hongbin.

content.en: One paper has been accepted to ATC'21. Congratulations to Shiyao.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 ATC'21 接收。祝贺 林诗尧。

content.en: One paper has been accepted to INFOCOM'21. Congratulations to Guowen.
content.zh: 一篇论文被 INFOCOM'21 接收。祝贺 龚国文。
